## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATOPT5, OPT5</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA OLIGOPEPTIDE TRANSPORTER 5, oligopeptide transporter 5
- **Description:**   oligopeptide transporter 5;(source:Araport11)
